verses.verse: And they came <S%G2064><s%> over to the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of the Gadarenes. <S%G1046><s%>

And when he was come <S%G1831><s%> out of the ship, <S%G4143><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> there met <S%G528><s%> him out of the tombs <S%G3419><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> with an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> his dwelling <S%G2731><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the tombs; <S%G3419><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> bind <S%G1210><s%> him, no, <S%G3777><s%> not with chains: <S%G254><s%>

Because <S%G1223><s%> that he had been often <S%G4178><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> with fetters <S%G3976><s%> and chains, <S%G254><s%> and the chains <S%G254><s%> had been plucked <S%G1288><s%> asunder <S%G1288><s%> by him, and the fetters <S%G3976><s%> broken <S%G4937><s%> in pieces: neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3762><s%> could <S%G2480><s%> any <S%G3762><s%> man tame <S%G1150><s%> him.

And always, <S%G1275><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and day, <S%G2250><s%> he was in the mountains, <S%G3735><s%> and in the tombs, <S%G3418><s%> crying, <S%G2896><s%> and cutting <S%G2629><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> with stones. <S%G3037><s%>
But when he saw <S%G1492><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off, <S%G575><s%> he ran <S%G5143><s%> and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him,

And cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> have I to do with you, Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> you Son <S%G5207><s%> of the most <S%G5310><s%> high <S%G5310><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%> I adjure <S%G3726><s%> you by God, <S%G2316><s%> that you torment <S%G928><s%> me not.
For he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Come <S%G1831><s%> out of the man, <S%G444><s%> you unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

And he asked <S%G1905><s%> him, What <S%G5101><s%> is your name? <S%G3686><s%> And he answered, <S%G611><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> My name <S%G3686><s%> is Legion: <S%G3003><s%> for we are many. <S%G4183><s%>
And he sought <S%G3870><s%> him much <S%G4183><s%> that he would not send <S%G649><s%> them away <S%G649><s%> out of the country. <S%G5561><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> was there near <S%G4314><s%> to the mountains <S%G3735><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> herd <S%G34><s%> of swine <S%G5519><s%> feeding. <S%G1006><s%>

And all <S%G3956><s%> the devils <S%G1142><s%> sought <S%G3870><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Send <S%G3992><s%> us into <S%G1519><s%> the swine, <S%G5519><s%> that we may enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> them.

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> gave <S%G2010><s%> them leave. <S%G2010><s%> And the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out, and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the swine: <S%G5519><s%> and the herd <S%G34><s%> ran <S%G3729><s%> violently down <S%G2596><s%> a steep <S%G2911><s%> place into <S%G1519><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> (they were about <S%G5613><s%> two <S%G1367><s%> thousand; <S%G1367><s%>) and were choked <S%G4155><s%> in the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And they that fed <S%G1006><s%> the swine <S%G5519><s%> fled, <S%G5343><s%> and told <S%G312><s%> it in the city, <S%G4172><s%> and in the country. <S%G68><s%> And they went <S%G1831><s%> out to see <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> it was that was done. <S%G1096><s%>

And they come <S%G2064><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and see <S%G2334><s%> him that was possessed <S%G1139><s%> with the devil, <S%G1139><s%> and had <S%G2192><s%> the legion, <S%G3003><s%> sitting, <S%G2521><s%> and clothed, <S%G2439><s%> and in his right <S%G4993><s%> mind: <S%G4993><s%> and they were afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

And they that saw <S%G1492><s%> it told <S%G1334><s%> them how <S%G4459><s%> it befell <S%G1096><s%> to him that was possessed <S%G1139><s%> with the devil, <S%G1139><s%> and also concerning <S%G4012><s%> the swine. <S%G5519><s%>
And they began <S%G756><s%> to pray <S%G3870><s%> him to depart <S%G565><s%> out of their coasts. <S%G3725><s%>
And when he was come <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ship, <S%G4143><s%> he that had been possessed <S%G1139><s%> with the devil <S%G1139><s%> prayed <S%G3870><s%> him that he might be with him.

However, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> suffered <S%G863><s%> him not, but said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Go <S%G5217><s%> home <S%G3624><s%> to your friends, <S%G4674><s%> and tell <S%G312><s%> them how <S%G3745><s%> great <S%G3745><s%> things the Lord <S%G2962><s%> has done <S%G4160><s%> for you, and has had compassion <S%G1653><s%> on you.

And he departed, <S%G565><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to publish <S%G2784><s%> in Decapolis <S%G1179><s%> how <S%G3745><s%> great <S%G3745><s%> things Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had done <S%G4160><s%> for him: and all <S%G3956><s%> men did marvel. <S%G2296><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was passed <S%G1276><s%> over <S%G1276><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> by ship <S%G4143><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side, <S%G4008><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> to him: and he was near <S%G3844><s%> to the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there comes <S%G2064><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the rulers <S%G752><s%> of the synagogue, <S%G752><s%> Jairus <S%G2383><s%> by name; <S%G3686><s%> and when he saw <S%G1492><s%> him, he fell <S%G4098><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> his feet, <S%G4228><s%>

And sought <S%G3870><s%> him greatly, <S%G4183><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> My little <S%G2365><s%> daughter <S%G2365><s%> lies <S%G2192><s%> at the point <S%G2079><s%> of death: <S%G2079><s%> I pray you, come <S%G2064><s%> and lay <S%G2007><s%> your hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> her, that she may be healed; <S%G4982><s%> and she shall live. <S%G2198><s%>
And Jesus went <S%G565><s%> with him; and much <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him, and thronged <S%G4918><s%> him.
And a certain woman, <S%G1135><s%> which had <S%G1510><s%> an issue <S%G4511><s%> of blood <S%G129><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%>

And had suffered <S%G3958><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things of many <S%G4183><s%> physicians, <S%G2395><s%> and had spent <S%G1159><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that she had, <S%G3844><s%> and was nothing <S%G3367><s%> bettered, <S%G5623><s%> but rather <S%G3123><s%> grew <S%G2064><s%> worse, <S%G5501><s%>
When she had heard <S%G191><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> in the press <S%G3793><s%> behind, <S%G3693><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> his garment. <S%G2440><s%>
For she said, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G2579><s%> I may touch <S%G680><s%> but his clothes, <S%G2440><s%> I shall be whole. <S%G4982><s%>

And straightway <S%G2112><s%> the fountain <S%G4077><s%> of her blood <S%G129><s%> was dried <S%G3583><s%> up; and she felt <S%G1097><s%> in her body <S%G4983><s%> that she was healed <S%G2390><s%> of that plague. <S%G3148><s%>

And Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> knowing <S%G1921><s%> in himself <S%G1438><s%> that virtue <S%G1411><s%> had gone <S%G1831><s%> out of him, turned <S%G1994><s%> him about <S%G1994><s%> in the press, <S%G3793><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> my clothes? <S%G2440><s%>

And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, You see <S%G991><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> thronging <S%G4918><s%> you, and say <S%G3004><s%> you, Who <S%G5101><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> me?
And he looked <S%G4017><s%> round <S%G4017><s%> about <S%G4017><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> her that had done <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thing.

But the woman <S%G1135><s%> fearing <S%G5399><s%> and trembling, <S%G5141><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> was done <S%G1096><s%> in her, came <S%G2064><s%> and fell <S%G4363><s%> down before <S%G4363><s%> him, and told <S%G2036><s%> him all <S%G3956><s%> the truth. <S%G225><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to her, Daughter, <S%G2364><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> has made <S%G4982><s%> you whole; <S%G4982><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> in peace, <S%G1515><s%> and be whole <S%G5199><s%> of your plague. <S%G3148><s%>

While he yet <S%G2089><s%> spoke, <S%G2980><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> from the ruler <S%G752><s%> of the synagogue's <S%G752><s%> house certain which said, <S%G3004><s%> Your daughter <S%G2364><s%> is dead: <S%G599><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> trouble <S%G4660><s%> you the Master <S%G1320><s%> any <S%G2089><s%> further? <S%G2089><s%>

As soon <S%G2112><s%> as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> that was spoken, <S%G2980><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to the ruler <S%G752><s%> of the synagogue, <S%G752><s%> Be not afraid, <S%G5399><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> believe. <S%G4100><s%>

And he suffered <S%G863><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> to follow <S%G4870><s%> him, save <S%G1508><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and James, <S%G2385><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> of James. <S%G2385><s%>

And he comes <S%G2064><s%> to the house <S%G3624><s%> of the ruler <S%G752><s%> of the synagogue, <S%G752><s%> and sees <S%G2334><s%> the tumult, <S%G2351><s%> and them that wept <S%G2799><s%> and wailed <S%G214><s%> greatly. <S%G4183><s%>

And when he was come <S%G1525><s%> in, he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> make <S%G2350><s%> you this ado, <S%G2350><s%> and weep? <S%G2799><s%> the damsel <S%G3813><s%> is not dead, <S%G599><s%> but sleeps. <S%G2518><s%>

And they laughed <S%G2606><s%> him to scorn. <S%G2606><s%> But when he had put <S%G1544><s%> them all <S%G537><s%> out, he takes <S%G3880><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> and the mother <S%G3384><s%> of the damsel, <S%G3813><s%> and them that were with him, and enters <S%G1531><s%> in where <S%G3699><s%> the damsel <S%G3813><s%> was lying. <S%G345><s%>

And he took <S%G2902><s%> the damsel <S%G3813><s%> by the hand, <S%G5495><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to her, Talitha <S%G5008><s%> cumi; <S%G2891><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is, being interpreted, <S%G3177><s%> Damsel, <S%G2877><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, arise. <S%G1453><s%>

And straightway <S%G2112><s%> the damsel <S%G2877><s%> arose, <S%G450><s%> and walked; <S%G4043><s%> for she was of the age of twelve <S%G1427><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%> And they were astonished <S%G1839><s%> with a great <S%G3173><s%> astonishment. <S%G1611><s%>

And he charged <S%G1291><s%> them straightly <S%G4183><s%> that no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> should know <S%G1097><s%> it; and commanded <S%G2036><s%> that something should be given <S%G1325><s%> her to eat. <S%G5315><s%>
